name: Voxels
description:
A simple voxel engine. The most recent build adds the dynamic goop voxel

-Controls-

WASD to move

B opens tile selection menu

C pauses simulation

Up/Down change simulation speed.

R selects an entity

P orders the dude to pathfind to the selected point if there is a valid path there

Scroll wheel changes cursor distance

1 for Tile tool

2 for Line tool

3 for Box tool

Left click to make placement, right click to cancel or remove tiles

` opens console, type help for commands
